posts.post_title: SOLD: 1879-80 New York Clipper Woodcuts - Dan Brouthers HOF Rookie  BGS Authentic
posts.post_content:
Good Evening, Collectors:

Up for sale today is a very rare 1879-80 New York Clipper Woodcuts - Dan Brouthers HOF Rookie which has been authenticated and encapsulated by Beckett Grading Services, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review scan of the item for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
